results.text: Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
results.reason: The verse highlights the guiding power of God's Word, akin to how HTML structures and guides the creation of web content.
results.reflection: God's Word illuminates our life journey, providing direction and clarity.

results.text: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness.
results.reason: This passage underscores the foundational role of Scripture, much like HTML forms the basis for web pages.
results.reflection: Embrace Scripture's role as a fundamental guide in life and spiritual growth.

results.text: so is my word that goes out from my mouth: It will not return to me empty, but will accomplish what I desire and achieve the purpose for which I sent it.
results.reason: Just as HTML content fulfills its purpose in a browser, God's Word is powerful and effective in achieving its divine purpose.
results.reflection: Trust in the efficacy of God's promises; they accomplish His will.

results.text: Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will never pass away.
results.reason: This verse speaks to the eternal nature of God's Word, much like how HTML is a timeless web standard.
results.reflection: Rely on the enduring truth of God's Word amidst changing times.

results.text: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow; it judges the thoughts and attitudes of the heart.
results.reason: The dynamic and penetrating nature of God's Word mirrors the interactive capabilities of HTML in creating engaging content.
results.reflection: Let God's Word actively transform and shape your inner life.
